mapper.select: select r.count, g.* from ( select * from ( select personcode, count(personcode) as count from ( select * from ugotfilm_director_choice where usercode=#{usercode})r group by personcode))r left join ugotfilm_director g on g.personcode=r.personcode order by count desc
